variable.label: Primary Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Short, Primary or 2-digit address, CV 1, range 1-127

variable.label: Start Voltage
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1, range 0(default)-32, CV2

variable.label: Acceleration
variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-32, CV3

variable.label: Deceleration
variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-32, CV4

variable.label: Top Voltage
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at top Speed Step, range 0-32(default), CV5

variable.label: Manufacturer version number
variable.tooltip: CV7=32 for many MRC models, Read Only

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: CV8=143 for MRC, Read Only

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended (4 digit) address, range 128-9999, mapped to CV17 and 18

variable.label: Advanced Consist Address
variable.tooltip: range 1-127, CV19

variable.label: Consist Direction
variable.tooltip: Normal(default) or Reversed(consist address+128), CV19

variable.label: Functions Respond To Address
variable.tooltip: CV21, least bit

variable.label: Normal direction of motion
variable.tooltip: CV29, '1' (least significant) bit, Forward(0)(default) or Reverse(1)

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: CV29, '2' bit. Sets the Speed Step for motor, also affects some light settings

variable.label: Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: CV29, '4' bit. Allows the loco to run on DC, default is Off

variable.label: Strobe Light
variable.tooltip: CV59, range 0(Double)-1(Single)

variable.label: Head/Rear Light
variable.tooltip: CV60, range 0, 1 or 2

variable.label: Ditch Light Rate, F1
variable.tooltip: CV61, range 0-32, F2 enables 10 flashes

variable.label: Mars Light Rate, F3
variable.tooltip: CV62, range 0-32

variable.label: Strobe Light Rate, F4
variable.tooltip: CV63, range 0-32

variable.label: Accessory Lighting Effects (Not Headlight)
variable.tooltip: CV64, 1(default) enables dedicated lighting effects

variable.label: User ID #1
variable.tooltip: CV105, range 0-255, code your own ID

variable.label: User ID #2
variable.tooltip: CV106, range 0-255, code your own ID

variable.label: Load Control Back emf
variable.tooltip: CV123, default Back EMF is Off

variable.label: Select Speed Curve
variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage increase curve with Speed Steps, range 0(default)-2, CV124

label.label: Controls whether this loco's functions (lights) respond in the consist,
or just to this loco's unique address
